column3: Tourism;Koh Kong: ------ A Highlander car span out of control and left the road at about 7 am on 10 October 2018 in O Lua commune
column7: white HIGHLANDER  with California number plate 4yBv692 driven by Son Suphac
column10: was traveling from Kampong Som to Koh Kong with three foreign passengers.------The injured were named as 62-year-old Laow Leavong
column14: a 61-year-old woman. The victims were taken to a district hospital.
